price: 184. Boye bazali kososola te? Moninga(2) na bango azali na ligboma te, kasi azali sé mokebisi ya polele.
arabic: أَوَلَمۡ يَتَفَكَّرُواْۗ مَا بِصَاحِبِهِم مِّن جِنَّةٍۚ إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٌ
footnotes: 2 Muhammad (kimia mpe losambo ya Allah ezala likolo naye).

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: awalam yatafakkarū mā biṣāḥibihim min jinnatin in huwa illā nadhīrun mubīnun
